ch.hslu.livingWithLightColors.BusinessLogic.Interfaces

Interface IBridge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhilipsBridge

    public interface IBridge
    Manages the connection to the lamp bridge. Opens and closes it, as wished.
    Author:
    Curdin Banzer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Opens the connection to the lamp bridge.
      void disconnect()
      Closes the connection to the lamp bridge.
      boolean isConnected()
      Checks if the bridge is connected and available.
      void setConnectionState(boolean connectionEstablished)
      Sets the connection state to the bridge.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
        Opens the connection to the lamp bridge. So that communication with the bridge and control of the lamps is possible.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Closes the connection to the lamp bridge. So that communication to the bridge and control of the lamps ends.

      • setConnectionState

        void setConnectionState(boolean connectionEstablished)
        Sets the connection state to the bridge.
        Parameters:
        connectionEstablished - The current connection state, to be set.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Checks if the bridge is connected and available. If not, it tries to connect to the bridge.
        Returns:
        True if the bridge is available, false if not.
